banner.title: Let's Build Something Great Together
banner.description: I'm a Graphic Designer by profession and UX/UI Designer by vocation, located in Santiago de Chile, LATAM.

about.title: About Me
about.technologies: Some of the technologies I have experience with

web_design.title: Web Design
web_design.description: I focus on creating attractive and accessible user interfaces for websites and web applications.

flow.title: User Flow & Wireframing
flow.description: The service seeks to create a logical and efficient structure for the user, and improve the user's interaction with the digital product. The ultimate goal is to provide an intuitive and satisfying user experience.

visual.title: Visual Design
visual.description: Through the use of colors, typography, images and other visual elements, I aim to create an attractive and coherent aesthetic for the digital product.

mobile.title: Mobile App Design
mobile.description: Through the use of intuitive designs, effective functionalities and an attractive visual design, I create a user experience that generates a positive and memorable impact on the user.

ux_ui.title: UX & UI Design
ux_ui.description: Through the use of user research techniques, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing, I aim to create a coherent and meaningful user experience that generates a positive impact on the user's perception of the digital product.

hire_me.title: DO YOU HAVE A PROJECT?
hire_me.subtitle: I'm ready to help you. Just write the details below.
hire_me.name: Your Name...
hire_me.yes_estimate: Yes, I need a cost estimate for services. I understand it takes 2-4 business days to receive the quote.
